message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth to you is $15,000, we're offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly. We're confident this investment will greatly benefit you and appreciate the chance to serve you. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know.
